name: MaFl_Tomba
oralText: All I need is my hammer, Tesh! I require no training.
introText: This hammer was forged from the steel of a thousand Steamwalkers! No one else is skilled or strong enough to wield it, except for me of course. You don't believe me? Try it! Hahaha!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: My name is Tomba Hammer and I am a soldier of Kion. This hammer goes everywhere with me. Everywhere. I live for battle, and a little extra penya doesn't hurt either.
